items.sentence: I just don't understand what goes through the minds of people who troll forums.
I hadn't recognized the importance of this document until you told me about it.
If the weather holds, we should be able to get this done by the end of the day.
Seeing what you have in your suitcases, I guess you're planning on a long stay.
Tom jacked up the car, so he could take off the flat tire and put on the spare.
